title: Increasing Womenâ€™s Participation in STEM
problem_statement: Despite progress, women remain underrepresented in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM). Structural and cultural barriers continue to limit participation.
key_questions: What barriers prevent women from pursuing STEM careers?
Which interventions have proven most effective globally?
How can mentorship and policy support increase representation?
method_brief: Literature review on gender diversity in STEM
Case study of successful mentorship programs
